Package ghost

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ambusher
    A specific type of ghost that targets 4 cells in front of the waka's position.
    App
    The App controls the flow of the game, loading images, drawing them on the screen, and storing all the game objects to be called at the correct times
    Cell
    Cell is an abstract class that provides a blueprint for each cell of the map.
    Chaser
    A specific type of ghost that targets the waka's exact position.
    Config
    The Config class takes a config file and parses it, storing the information in instance variables.
    Entity
    Defined basic functionality for a entity (any object that moves on the screen).
    Ghost
    Provides generic functionality for a ghost, which is then used to create the specific behaviour of the ghost types.
    Ignorant
    A specific type of ghost that targets the waka's exact position when more than 8 cells away, then targets a corner.
    Map
    Stores a list of list of cells that makes up the map, as well as starting positions for entities and the fruit count.
    Space
    A type of Cell that is any cell type you can move through, this includes fruit, empty spaces and superfruit.
    Waka
    An extension of entity that stores all information and mechanics of the waka.
    Wall
    All cell types an entity cannot move through, this includes all wall variations
    Whim
    A specific type of ghost that uses the chaser and waka's position to calculate its target.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    cellType
    An enum that holds all of the different possible types of cells, their representation on a map, and the image file for them.
    Direction
    An enum that holds the four possible directions for entities.
    ghostType
    Provides image filenames and Sprites for the different ghost types.
